feed.title: LazyWarden Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for LazyWarden: Added Vikunja, Storj, Cloudflare R2, and Docker Hub Image
entry.content:
What's New in v1.0.0

  • Vikunja Integration: Added support for synchronizing tasks with Vikunja.
  • Storj Support: Implemented functionality to store backups on Storj.
  • Cloudflare R2 Integration: Implemented functionality to store backups on Cloudflare R2.
  • Docker Hub: Published the official Docker Image.

entry.title: New release for LazyWarden: NTFY Notifications and Backblaze B2 Storage Added
entry.content:
What's New in v1.1.0

  • NTFY Notifications Integration: Support for NTFY notifications has been added, providing users with more alerting options and more effective real-time monitoring.
  • Backblaze B2 Storage: Backup storage functionality has been implemented in Backblaze B2, offering a cloud storage solution.
  • Optimised Secrets Management: Lazywarden now only requires the secrets of the services you wish to use, simplifying configuration and reducing the need to declare unnecessary variables.
